title: AI Inspection
text: Benefit from AI-powered tools for thorough inspections and early issue identification.

section.title: IAQ Inspection
section.content: Indoor Air Quality(IAQ) monitoring, conduct daily IAQ checks with results visualized within the digital twin environment.

section.title: Water Leak Detection
section.content: Identify and address water leaks proactively.

section.title: Lift Noise Analysis
section.content: Detect and act on abnormal lift noise to prevent potential malfunctions.
